revision.text: [[Farm Items|Mulch]] and [[Farm Items|Berry Shovel]] can be bought in [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]], [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Mauville City]], [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]]. Mulches can be applied to Berry plants to speed up growth (Boost Mulch), increase harvest yield (Rich Mulch), increase mutation chance (Surprise Mulch), or all the above with a slightly reduced boost for all three (Amaze Mulch). [[Farm Items|Berry Shovels]] can be used to clear occupied plots.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
